text: was a Japanese politician. He was a member of the House of Councillors from 1977 to 1986, and of the House of Representatives from 1990 to 2012. He was Minister of Finance from 1993 to 1994 and again from 2009 to 2010. He was born in Tokyo, Japan. Fujii died on 10 July 2022 in Tokyo from problems caused by pneumonia, aged 90. ==References== Category:1932 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Politicians from Tokyo Category:Infectious disease deaths in Japan Category:Deaths from pneumonia Category:Ministers of finance of Japan
title: Hirohisa Fujii
